scripts.build: cd ../../../packages/nativescript-sdk/ && npm i --no-audit && rimraf node_modules/kinvey-js-sdk && npm run build
scripts.pretest: npm run symlink-js-sdk && npm run build-js-sdk && npm run build && node ../setup.js --target=nativescript && node scripts/test.js --clean
scripts.test: npm run test:ios && npm run test:android
scripts.test-android: npm run pretest && npm run test:android && npm run posttest
scripts.test-ios: npm run pretest && npm run test:ios && npm run posttest
scripts.test:android: cd TestApp && tns clean && tns test android && cd ... || (npm run posttest && exit 1)
scripts.test:ios: cd TestApp && tns clean && tns test ios && cd .. || (npm run posttest && exit 1)
